thread.title: Lawrence H. "Larry" Head, Jr.
thread.title_full: Biblio.com reviewed by Lawrence H. "Larry" Head, Jr.

author: Lawrence H. "Larry" Head, Jr.
title: Lawrence H. "Larry" Head, Jr.
text: The vendors, Michael & Genny Winne (d/b/a About Books) did an extraordinary job of wrapping and packaging my book. (Nothing disappoints a bibliophile like damage in transit.) So, it arrived exactly as advertised, in Near Fine condition, and after just a short time. Doing business w/them is a genuine pleasure.
